title: Food Environment Atlas (FEA)
description: The Food Access Research Atlas presents an overview of food access indicators for low-income and other census tracts using different measures of supermarket accessibility. It provides food access data for populations within census tracts and it offers census-tract-level data on food access that can be downloaded for community planning or research purposes.
creator: Economic Research Service (ERS), U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA)
subject: Food Environment

Housing units without a vehicle
